website_summaries.verdict: The Fierce Knit, from Puma lifestyle shoe collection, offers the perfect combination of robust materials and lightweight construction. While it works as a lifestyle sneaker, it has the technical aspects for enduring rigorous activities. It is a good value for the money considering its features. The only drawback, though, is its rubber material that can feel hot especially during the summer.
pros: The Puma Fierce Knit has an internal flatlock stitching which lessens friction
The shoe promotes a movement of 360 degrees through its pivot points applied to the outsole toe and heel
It has a rubber outsole for traction
The tongue and heel sections have a pull tab for easy on and off
The heel is exaggeratedly thick to provide more stability
Most people who own a pair of these shoes say that it is comfortable
The majority of online shoppers observe that the Puma Fierce Knit is true to size
cons: A reviewer complains that the rubber material is very hot and recommends it as winter wear
An online shopper claims that the toe part feels narrow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe indeed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe indeed! Just as vibrant as the picture itself....but better guys. I wear btw a 7 & 7.5. Before reading the reviews, mostly on beauty, I missed the part whereas the DO RUN SLIGHTLY LARGE. I'm returning this pair for a 1/2 size smaller. The area where your toes would be is widened. My feet are narrow also. I hope that this helps ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Grey and Black - Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7, ordered 7 and it is true to size. Love them! If you choose the 'black' option, they are grey and black (which I wanted) not all black just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. I already had 3 pair. Shoes are excellent for jogging and workouts! Best shoes I’ve ever had for comfort. Feels like i’m on jogging on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: K$sha

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and style but can be a struggle ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and style but can be a struggle to put on; if you can't be bothered with struggling to put on your shoes, then don't get this, not a shoes to keep on all day either, needed more padding. I kept it because it's different in color and style to add to my collection of unique shoes. I love shoes!
customer_reviews.author: CONASSIS

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dance workouts and..while I love them and how they look and that i don't have to hassle with laces, i find the sole too flat. I am using these with gel inserts that prevent plantar fasciitis and they have been perfect ever since. Without those though, tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Reema

customer_reviews.title: Hooked on PUMA
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond obsessed with these sneakers. They are super comfortable and I get compliments on them all day long. I am a size 7.5 in sneakers and these fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: They Fit Perfect 👌🏾 I Bought A 7.5 The Only Downside Is They Get Dirty Real Fast So Their Hard To Keep Clean . So I Put Mines In The Washing Machine (Little Bleach ONLY WHEN NEEDED) But NEVER In The Dryer !! Let Them Airdry Overnight & ✨ Like New Again 😍

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are soooooo nice! Had to return due to the fact that ...

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome shoes, but the back on my left one ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes, but the back on my left one crumbles from the inside. I'm not sure if it's defective. But all in all they look great and fit nice as long as I hold up the back as I put it on

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Fierce Knit Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description: This demi-cut, lightweight trainer combines performance technology with eye-catching style.
